capsules_submitted.utterance: Ron's lineage is indeed quite impressive. As a wizard myself, I can appreciate the importance of having a strong magical heritage. Ron's pure-blood background has certainly served him well in his battles against the Dark Lord.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never heard of a pure blood wizard before, valeria   that's fascinating!

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm a huge fan of Professor McGonagall. I mean, she's an amazing witch and an incredible role model for young witches like myself. Her lineage is indeed pure-blood, and it's really admirable how she's managed to balance her heritage with her own values and sense of justice.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never heard of mcgonagall before, but i'm so excited to learn more about her!

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've been thinking about Professor McGonagall a lot lately. She's definitely an adult, you know? I mean, she's one of the most experienced and wise witches of our time.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never met an adult before, this is really interesting!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is an adult. I've always thought he was a bit of a mysterious character, but now that we know his age, it's interesting to consider how that might have shaped his experiences at Hogwarts.
capsules_submitted.reply: this is news to me. i've never heard of professor flitwick before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him   what's he like?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is an adult. I've always thought he was a bit of a mysterious character, but now that we know his age, it's interesting to consider how that might have influenced his teaching style and relationships with the other students at Hogwarts.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what is the attribute that flitwick exported?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've been noticing that Harry has been looking a bit under the weather lately. He's always been quite slender, but I think he might be losing weight. Have you seen him recently?
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of harry before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been told that Harry has a gray mouse as one of his belongings. That's definitely true, and I'm quite certain about it. It sounds like a pretty ordinary item to have around, but I suppose it could be useful in some way.
capsules_submitted.reply: interesting! i've never heard of a gray mouse before, valeria! tell me more about it.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Ron's belongings include a gray mouse. I'm quite certain about that, and it sounds like a pretty neutral thing to own - not particularly exciting or surprising.
capsules_submitted.reply: wow! so, ron's belongings and harry's belongings both have a gray mouse.

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've been thinking about Harry and his belongings. It's interesting that he has a gray mouse as one of them. I'd say I'm fairly certain about this, it's not something I'd normally forget. The sentiment around this is quite neutral to me, but I can see why someone might find it unusual.
